 The veto mode, indicating whether the implementation of a listener or similar issues to cancel the current operation. More...


Variables

friend MenuPopup

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum VetoMode
 

The veto mode, indicating whether the implementation of a listener or similar issues to cancel the current operation.

Enumeration values:
NO_VETO  Vetoable event methods return this value to indicate that they do not want to cancel the event.

VETO  Vetoable event methods return this value to indicate that they want to cancel the event.

Definition at line 19 of file VetoMode.h.
